events.title: TVG San Francisco Trek
events.description: Visited top VC firms (Sequoia, Entrepreneurs First, Vista, Gradient Ventures, Transpose, Heavybit, Antler) and high-growth startups (Crusoe, Tavus, Mira) in San Francisco.

events.title: TVG x a16z & Saronic & Base (American Dynamism)
events.description: TVG Mega-event: TVG and a16z brought the Austin venture community together for an incredible night featuring Doug Lambert (Co-Founder & COO, Saronic Technologies), Erin Prince-Wright (GP, Andreessen Horowitz American Dynamism), and Jared Green (Head of Software, Base Power Company), who shared incredible insights about scaling hard-tech ventures.

events.title: TVG x Bessemer Venture Partners
events.description: Fireside chat with Jason Scheller and John Drake, General Partners at Bessemer Venture Partners, which gave us rare chance to dig into sourcing, founder judgment, and the realities of evaluating companies at the earliest stages.

events.title: TVG x Superhuman
events.description: Fireside chat with Vivek Sodera, Founder & GP of Supercharge.vc and Co-Founder of Superhuman Mail, who shared lessons from scaling Superhuman (recently acquired by Grammarly), his experience co-founding LiveRamp (IPO: RAMP), and his journey backing 20+ AI-centric startups across Silicon Valley and Austin.

events.title: TVG x Throne
events.description: Fireside chat with Scott Hickle, co-founder of Throne Science, a company pioneering continuous gut health testing to help people improve their health with every flush

events.title: TVG x a16z Crypto
events.description: Fireside chat with Chris Lyons, a General Partner at a16z leading the firm's crypto investment efforts, shared insights about web3's evolution and early-stage investing in crypto

events.title: TVG x Amenities Health
events.description: Fireside chat with Aasim Saeed (MD-MPA), who clarified many misconceptions about healthcare and delineated how he helped many hospitals (including Baylor Scott & White) unlock millions of dollars in profit

events.title: TVG x BuildGroup
events.description: Fireside chat with Jim Curry, co-founder of BuildGroup, who brought a powerhouse perspective on long-term growth and investing with purpose.

events.title: TVG x TXB x Quai Network: Demo Day
events.description: TVG and TXB hosted UT Austin's top founders for an evening of decentralized AI discussions and live startup pitches at the DeAI office. Founders competed for over $2K in cash prizes, followed by networking with peers and judges. Sponsored by Quai Network.

events.title: TVG x Saga Ventures
events.description: Fireside chat with Max Altman, co-founder of Saga Ventures, who discussed the nature of VC in the Bay Area and his passion for AI, fintech, and manufacturing.

events.title: TVG x Earl Grey Capital
events.description: Fireside chat with Amit Vasudev, co-founder of Earl Grey Capital, who shared incredible insights on early-stage tech investing and his journey from starting Clearbit to his own VC firm.

events.title: TVG x USIT x Tacora Capital
events.description: With USIT, hosted fireside chat with Keri Findley, founder of Tacora Capital, first female partner at Third Point LLC, and Columbia University graduate, who discussed asset-based lending for VC-backed companies and her journey as a trailblazing woman in finance.

events.title: TVG x Capital Creek Partners
events.description: Fireside chat with Jordyn Gauntt, senior associate at Capital Creek Partners, mentor for Girls Who Invest, and advisor for UT Austin's MSF program.

events.title: TVG x LiveOak Ventures
events.description: Fireside chat with Venu Shamapant, co-founder of LiveOak Ventures with $500M+ AUM, who reflected on his early years in VC and the Austin startup ecosystem

events.title: TVG x S3 Ventures
events.description: Fireside chat with Brian Smith, founder of S3 Ventures with over $900M AUM, who shared insights from his 18+ years of venture experience.

events.title: TVG x Kamerra
events.description: Fireside chat with Gautam Shah, partner at Kamerra, who discussed digital transformation investments and his experience in finance and strategy.

events.title: TVG x Energy Transition Ventures
events.description: Fireside chat with Craig Lawrence, founder of Energy Transition Ventures, who delved into cleantech investing and energy transition.

events.title: TVG x Untitled Capital
events.description: Fireside chat with Roger Dickey, Managing Partner at Untitled Capital, who discussed his experience investing in 120+ startups and founding successful companies.

events.title: TVG x TUIT x Grafton Street Partners
events.description: Co-hosted Stephen Santrach with TUIT, co-founder of Grafton Street Partners, who shared insights from managing a $500M+ investment fund.

events.title: TVG x NVIDIA
events.description: Fireside chat with Anish Maddipoti, who shared his journey from college startup founder to product manager at NVIDIA working on AI developer tools.

events.title: TVG x Velo CFO
events.description: Fireside chat with Vibhav Joopelli, UT Austin alum and founder of Velo CFO, who discussed outsourced CFO services for VC-backed startups.

events.title: TVG Bevs & Devs x Z Fellows
events.description: Networking event with students from TVG Bevs & Devs and Z Fellows.

events.title: TVG x CVP x SVS: Student VC Mixer
events.description: Co-hosted with Columbia Venture Partners, NYU Strategic Venture Society, and Ocean Ventures, this happy hour gave students in the NYC area involved in the venture capital and startup ecosystem a perfect opportunity to network, share ideas, and enjoy light bites in a causal setting.

events.title: TVG x New York City
events.description: From January 7th-8th, TVG ventured to New York City and connected with leading venture capital firms, including Insight Partners, NEA, and Bessemer Venture Partners, as well as innovators like Adam Dell. We enjoyed diving deeper into the world of VC and entrepreneurship in NYC.

events.title: TVG x TREL x Saronic
events.description:
Texas Venture Group (TVG) and Texas Rocket Engineering Lab (TREL) are pleased to welcome Saronic to UT Austin for an exclusive informational and recruitment event. The event will be hosted in Robert B. Rowling Hall (Room 4.402). We encourage attendees to visit saronic.com and conduct some preliminary research on the company prior to the event.

Saronic, an Austin-based startup that is developing autonomous ships for defense, has recently raised $55 million in a Series A funding round from 8VC, a16z, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Point72 Ventures, Silent Ventures, and others. Saronic was co-founded by Ex-Navy Seal Dino Mavrookas, Ex-Lead Perception Engineer at Anduril, Vibhav A, and others.

events.title: TVG x LEC x Base Power Company
events.description: Texas Venture Group (TVG) and Longhorn Energy Club (LEC) are pleased to welcome Base Power Company to UT Austin for an exclusive informational event. The event will be hosted in Robert B. Rowling Hall (Room 5.408). We encourage attendees to visit basepowercompany.com and conduct some preliminary research on the company prior to the event.

events.title: Pipedream Labs: Innovation in Logistics
events.description: Talk + Q&A with Canon Reeves, CTO of Pipedream Labs.

events.title: TVG x Genesis x Momentum
events.description: Entrepreneur First Pitch Competition - Showcasing the next generation of student founders.

events.title: Lazard: Venture & Growth Banking
events.description: Talk + Q&A from the Venture & Growth Banking team at Lazard.

events.title: BMW iVentures: Financial Modeling
events.description: Financial modeling workshop with Scott Walbrun, Principal at BMW iVentures

events.title: Crypto Panel
events.description: Expert panel discussion on the future of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.

events.title: TVG x Foundational Capital
events.description: TVG hosted a panel discussion with Foundation Capital, inviting speakers building in defense tech, robotics, and the VR software sectors.
